name: seo-optimizing
description: Data-driven SEO optimization using Google Search Console. Find striking-distance keywords, fix low-CTR pages, detect keyword cannibalization, analyze declining pages, and execute content optimizations backed by real search data. Also use when the user mentions 'GSC', 'Search Console', 'optimize SEO', 'keyword optimization', 'CTR optimization', 'search performance', 'ranking improvement', or 'content optimization strategy'.
